name: EDAN
description:
In Edan you play as Edan, the aspiring adventurer. You go on your first Journey and find the Amulet, as several interesting things come your way deeper into the Ruins..

 Controls:

 - WASD/Left Stick to Move

 - Spacebar/A to Jump

- E/X to Interact

- Mouse/Right Stick to move the camera 

Credits:

Sounds: WeLoveIndies

 Assets: Ilias Y. Sherzad

 Level Design: Ilias Y. Sherzad

 Testing: Lars, Fabian, Luan
